Column Comment.0: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.1: ORIGIN OBSERVATION NUMBER: Unique number identifying the object that wentinto the creation of a source.
Column Comment.2: ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation used for reference type or code.
Column Comment.3: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.4: EFFECTIVE DATE: The date that the data in this row first came into effect.
Column Comment.5: EXPIRY DATE: The date that the data in this row was no longer active or in effect.
Column Comment.6: LONG NAME: Common long name given to reference type or code.
Column Comment.7: OWNER BUSINESS ASSOCIATE ID: Unique identifier for the business associatewho is the owner of this source.
Column Comment.8: PHYSICAL ITEM IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for a physical item such as aspreadsheet etc. that is the source of the data.
Column Comment.9: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.10: PROJECT IDENTIFIER: Unique identifier for the project that is the owner or sourceof data.
Column Comment.11: REMARK: Narrative remarks about this row of data.
Column Comment.12: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.13: SHORT NAME: Common short name given to reference type or code.
Column Comment.14: SOURCE DOCUMENT: The source document that is the source for the data.
Column Comment.15: SOFTWARE APPLICATION IDENTIFIER: The identifier for the application that ownsthis alias or code or that is used to apply the data in this row.
Column Comment.16: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.17: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.18: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.19: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.20: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.21: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.22: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
